languages.text: "Вот... это... мон-кай считают боевой машиной? Даже прикасаться к ней не буду, тем более — лезть внутрь".
"The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."
languages.original_text: "Вот... это... мон-кай считают боевой машиной? Даже прикасаться к ней не буду, тем более — лезть внутрь".

traits.locale_text: "The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."
"The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."
"The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."
"The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."
"The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."
"The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."

languages.text: «¿Los mon-keigh consideráis... esto... un arma de guerra? No pienso ni tocarlo, mucho menos meterme dentro».
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Los mon-keigh consideráis... esto... un arma de guerra? No pienso ni tocarlo, mucho menos meterme dentro».

languages.text: “猴子居然觉得……这种东西……算是战争机械？我连碰都不想碰，更别说钻进去了。”
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."

traits.locale_text: “猴子居然觉得……这种东西……算是战争机械？我连碰都不想碰，更别说钻进去了。”

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイはこれが戦艦になると考えているのか？触りたくもない、ましてや乗るなんてまっぴらごめんだ」
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイはこれが戦艦になると考えているのか？触りたくもない、ましてや乗るなんてまっぴらごめんだ」

languages.text: « Ce genre de... tas de ferraille passe vraiment pour un engin de guerre aux yeux des mon-keigh ? Peuh, ne comptez pas sur moi pour y toucher, et encore moins pour monter dedans. »
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."

traits.locale_text: « Ce genre de... tas de ferraille passe vraiment pour un engin de guerre aux yeux des mon-keigh ? Peuh, ne comptez pas sur moi pour y toucher, et encore moins pour monter dedans. »

languages.text: "Mon-keighler... Bunu... Savaş aracı mı sayıyor? İçine girmek şöyle dursun, ona dokunmam bile."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighler... Bunu... Savaş aracı mı sayıyor? İçine girmek şöyle dursun, ona dokunmam bile."

languages.text: "Die Chem-Pan-Sey halten ... das ... für ein Kriegsgerät? Ich werde es nicht einmal berühren, geschweige denn betreten."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh consider... this... to be a vessel of war? I won't even touch it, much less get inside it."

traits.locale_text: "Die Chem-Pan-Sey halten ... das ... für ein Kriegsgerät? Ich werde es nicht einmal berühren, geschweige denn betreten."
